body: The black guy at the end was more interesting.
For a brief but glorious second I thought this was a continuation of 320617. I think that would've been too much for this universe. Arakure's characters look so much alike, but still great tho
Wait who's getting cucked here? The black haired guy who only appeared on a few pages or the lighter haired together with the girl and the fat guy at the end?
The art is so simple yet so good, really solid one right here

Arakure's stories are always NTR-focused so it relates a lot to bitches/sluts addicted to pleasure. A handful of guys don't like their stuff, either story or art-wise. I don't mind the stories, they are nothing new to me, but I quite like Arakure's art. They aren't God-tier, and in fact, it's laced with tons of bbm, oldje (old man), ugly bastards and the like; but looking past that, it has a unique style that comes with a high consistency and clean expression in each of the panels that makes it quite pleasant to watch.
first com bitch will be always bi***
